reviews.review:
Rivalling Mortal Kombat in its collection of horror franchise crossovers. In desperate need of a streamlined approach to buying DLC characters, and the game's cosmetic microtransaction prices can be a bit strange sometimes. (No lootboxes though!) Despite this, it's one of the few successful asymmetrical competitive games out there and is either hilarious, frustrating, or hilariously frustrating depending on how uncommunicative or uncooperative your teammates are. 

If you're the killer, the same applies. Hitting a 15 metre axe throw will always feel great, but getting blinded all match by a teabagging pack of M&Ms won't. The base game is constantly on sale and ridiculously cheap. You get 7 survivors and 6 killers with the base edition, each with their own progression trees that'll keep the carrot dangling for a good while. Give it a shot, see if it's the unique multiplayer you're looking for.

And don't worry if you're not a fan of horror games! Leatherface is far less frightening after a few pallets to the face.

BHVR is an absolute garbage company and their "support staff" is actually totally incompetent. The guy my ticket was assigned to, Vorfidus, seriously can't read or something. He really can't read, straight up doesn't care about his job, or just can't follow along and lacks any kind of awareness to figure out what is happening with support tickets

I filled out a ticket and they took EIGHT DAYS to respond. They took so long I just assumed they didn't get it or something, so I tried again. All I received during that time was a clearly automated response e-mail that they would look at it and thanks for being patient. I tried another ticket THIRTEEN DAYS after the first ticket. The second time I tried I actually got a response SIX DAYS later, but their response was "We see you already made a ticket previously." and then they closed both, without helping with my problem at all. No information, and really no help whatsoever. Just totally dismissive.

3k hours put in, hundreds of dollars spent, and their "support" is just terrible. He is AWFUL to deal with and apparently the only one there that deals with these issues, so I guess I'm just screwed. Game was pretty fun until now. 5 year run comes to a screeching halt over some nonsense I can't get any help with
